XPathExpressionException(java.lang.Throw.Description: Constructs a new XPathExpressionException with the specified cause. If cause is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.

XPathExpressionException(java.lang.Strin.Description: Constructs a new XPathExpressionException with the specified detail message. The cause is not initialized. If message is null, then a NullPointerException is thrown.

ClassDesc: XPathExpressionException represents an error in an XPath expression.
